text: <https://www.oilshell.org/blog/2022/03/backlog-arch.html|A Sketch of the Biggest Idea in Software Architecture> A discussion of architecture at the systems level, focusing around the idea of "narrow waists", which are protocols that support composition.

elements.text: A Sketch of the Biggest Idea in Software Architecture
A discussion of architecture at the systems level, focusing around the idea of "narrow waists", which are protocols that support composition.

attachments.fallback: A Sketch of the Biggest Idea in Software Architecture
attachments.text: Narrow waists: an idea in software architecture that relates to networking, operating systems, language design, compilers, and distributed systems.
